display_long_description:
#                                                                                                                                                                                                      
[media]
# **Fight the Undead**
Undead Quest is a VR rogue-lite wave shooter. Hit, dodge, and slash your way through thousands of fun-filled undead foes.

[media]
# **Hit, Dodge, Slash, Repeat**
Your primary weapons are a bat and a magic ball. Master your skills and kill the undead from a distance or use the environment to make a combo kill.

[media]
# **Upgrade and Build Ultimate Skillset** 
Collect the points and choose from dozens of available upgrades - augment your ball with devastating powers.

[media]
# **One More Run**
Uncover the mystery of the undead by completing the story mode or see how long you can survive in survival mode. The game sessions are roguelite-inspired, so each playthrough and skill set you create will be unique.

# **Fight the Undead**
Undead Quest is a VR rogue-lite wave shooter. Hit, dodge, and slash your way through thousands of fun-filled undead foes.

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/507828918_751061897295113_399559700241501768_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=I0rpKNpsOloQ7kNvwFYnBCA&_nc_oc=AdkbWxag4XdGVsBMud726R5rrBOxblJzIfh4or-xNG8kQRH9jNsCj_0QyblRNNvZNXw&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=OYDBe2P4Hq5p2Lz9B7T71Q&oh=00_AfoA1k0jGvnP2aBOPr2xScFnQ4PR7e7xzW0mrj_hqqNhcA&oe=69692559)
# **Hit, Dodge, Slash, Repeat**
Your primary weapons are a bat and a magic ball. Master your skills and kill the undead from a distance or use the environment to make a combo kill.

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491823763_4154099168195233_6412607577589191733_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=W_UaZmiuIzgQ7kNvwHNIqdl&_nc_oc=Admgg6sLwFeQJT5zo2ZdR8_r8Gf4lEC7YhOiBdqcykza69y_t7dm_B58GGt4LmmbOc8&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=OYDBe2P4Hq5p2Lz9B7T71Q&oh=00_Afq2497wkddlSsXE13IBqgNanoXUyRlbv7PlWvbHft0sjA&oe=69693E1E)
# **Upgrade and Build Ultimate Skillset** 
Collect the points and choose from dozens of available upgrades - augment your ball with devastating powers.

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491820987_1099167878797501_6609429194438124224_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=v3cs9IcqdAoQ7kNvwFJjVAW&_nc_oc=Adk57wZjL29F3wz1rOQtCG9_O4_-9_KQ1kMhdXnkUQpawkqOTE3_QKPo6hALbnuoNpQ&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=OYDBe2P4Hq5p2Lz9B7T71Q&oh=00_Afo82KvZ6n0Lm6L_Vw-u2ufhfKm1lf3JC0-hijAG6hmVxA&oe=696956CA)
# **One More Run**
Uncover the mystery of the undead by completing the story mode or see how long you can survive in survival mode. The game sessions are roguelite-inspired, so each playthrough and skill set you create will be unique.
